languages.text: 「コロニーの機能が低下したと言っているのか？」
languages.original_text: "Are you saying the colony has become less functional?"

traits.locale_text: 「コロニーの機能が低下したと言っているのか？」

languages.text: "Soll das heißen, die Kolonie funktioniert jetzt schlechter?"
languages.original_text: "Are you saying the colony has become less functional?"

traits.locale_text: "Soll das heißen, die Kolonie funktioniert jetzt schlechter?"

languages.text: « Vous voulez dire que la colonie est moins fonctionnelle qu'auparavant ? »
languages.original_text: "Are you saying the colony has become less functional?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez dire que la colonie est moins fonctionnelle qu'auparavant ? »

languages.text: «¿Insinúa que la colonia ya no funciona como es debido?».
languages.original_text: "Are you saying the colony has become less functional?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Insinúa que la colonia ya no funciona como es debido?».

languages.text: “你是说，这个殖民地的运作受到影响了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Are you saying the colony has become less functional?"

traits.locale_text: “你是说，这个殖民地的运作受到影响了吗？”

languages.text: "Yani koloninin daha az işlevsel hâle geldiğini mi söylüyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Are you saying the colony has become less functional?"

traits.locale_text: "Yani koloninin daha az işlevsel hâle geldiğini mi söylüyorsun?"
